SEARCH
Package Backend.Control

Class InternshipControl

java.lang.Object
Backend.Control.InternshipControl
public class InternshipControl extends Object
Controls all internship opportunity operations in the system. Manages creation, approval, visibility, and filtering of internship opportunities. Company representatives can create up to 5 opportunities with maximum 10 slots each. Students can view and apply to internships based on their major and year of study. Career staff approve or reject internship opportunities before they become visible to students.

All CSV operations use proper field escaping to handle special characters (commas, quotes) in internship titles, descriptions, and company names, ensuring data integrity.

    Constructs an InternshipControl and loads all internship opportunities from database.

    • setApplicationControl

      Parameters:
      appCtrl - the application controller

    • getInternshipDetails

      public List<String> getInternshipDetails(String internshipID)
      Return details for display (labelled strings) for a given internship ID.

    • requestCreateInternshipOpportunity

      public String requestCreateInternshipOpportunity(String internshipTitle, String description, String internshipLevel, List<String> preferredMajors, String openDateStr, String closeDateStr, String numberOfSlotsStr)
      Request to create a new internship opportunity by a company representative. All text fields (title, description, company name) are properly escaped to handle special characters like commas and quotes.
      Parameters:
      internshipTitle - the title of the internship
      description - detailed description of the internship (can contain commas, quotes)
      internshipLevel - the level (Basic, Intermediate, Advanced)
      preferredMajors - list of preferred majors for applicants
      openDateStr - opening date in yyyy-MM-dd format
      closeDateStr - closing date in yyyy-MM-dd format
      numberOfSlotsStr - number of available slots (max 10)
      Returns:
      the auto-generated internship ID
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if user not logged in or max internships reached
      IllegalArgumentException - if number of slots exceeds 10

    • getInternshipStatus

      public List<String> getInternshipStatus()
      Return a list of formatted internship lines for display to the company representative.

    • getMyInternshipsWithStatus

      public List<String> getMyInternshipsWithStatus()
      Return company rep's internships formatted for UI table with status. Format: internshipID=... | internshipTitle=... | internshipLevel=... | companyName=... | preferredMajors=[...] | status=...

    • getApplicationsForInternship

      public List<String> getApplicationsForInternship(String internshipID)
      Return applications for a given internship (company rep only). Format per line: applicationNumber=... | studentMajors=[major1, major2] | status=... Does NOT include student name or ID.

    • getDetailedStudentInfoForApplication

      public String getDetailedStudentInfoForApplication(int applicationNumber)
      Return detailed student information for a specific application (company rep only). Format: studentID=... | studentName=... | studentEmail=... | studentMajors=[...] | studentYear=... | status=...

    • approveApplicationForInternship

      public String approveApplicationForInternship(String internshipID, int applicationNumber)
      Approve application and return a status message. Returns additional notification if internship becomes full.

    • rejectApplicationForInternship

      public void rejectApplicationForInternship(String internshipID, int applicationNumber)
      Reject application by internship ID and application number (company rep only).

    • viewApplications

      public List<String> viewApplications(String internshipID)
      Return a list of formatted application lines for display to the company representative.

      public void rejectApplicationAsCompanyRep(int applicationNumber)

      public List<String> getPendingInternshipOpportunities()
      Return formatted lines for pending internship opportunities (for boundary printing).

    • getAllVisibleInternshipOpportunitiesForDisplay

      public List<String> getAllVisibleInternshipOpportunitiesForDisplay(String filterType, boolean ascending, Map<String,List<String>> filterIn)
      Return formatted lines for visible internships applying the provided filter criteria. The parameters are unpacked to keep frontend Filter types decoupled from backend. Any of the parameters may be null (null filterIn means no criteria; empty filterType means no sorting).

      Toggle visibility by internship ID (public wrapper for CLIs)

    • changeVisibilityByID

      public void changeVisibilityByID(String internshipID, String visibleStr)
      Set visibility by internship ID using a string value (safe wrapper for external UIs). Accepts boolean-like strings (y/n, yes/no, approve/reject, a/r).

    • getVisibleCompanyNames

      public List<String> getVisibleCompanyNames()
      Return unique company names among visible internship opportunities.

      Format preferredMajors list into a bracketed, comma-separated string for display.

    • getApprovedVisibleInternshipOpportunitiesForDisplay

      public List<String> getApprovedVisibleInternshipOpportunitiesForDisplay(String filterType, boolean ascending, Map<String,List<String>> filterIn)
      Return formatted lines for approved, visible internships applying the provided filter criteria. This avoids exposing entities to the UI and centralizes approved-only logic. For students, only shows internships matching their major(s).

    • canCurrentLoggedInStudentApply

      public boolean canCurrentLoggedInStudentApply(String internshipID)
      Return whether the currently logged-in user (if a student) can apply to the given internship ID. Encapsulates auth checks and requirement checks so the UI doesn't need to access entities.

    • getLoggedInStudentYear

      public Integer getLoggedInStudentYear()
      Return logged-in student year (3/4 gating logic for level filter) or null if not a student / not found.
